name: James A. NEWBREY, Respondent, v. The TOWNSHIP AND SCHOOL DISTRICT OF UPPER ST. CLAIR and Douglas A. Watkins, Township Manager, Petitioner
name_abbreviation: Newbrey v. Township & School District of Upper St. Clair

parties: James A. NEWBREY, Respondent, v. The TOWNSHIP AND SCHOOL DISTRICT OF UPPER ST. CLAIR and Douglas A. Watkins, Township Manager, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 17th day of May, 2000, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED and the order of the Commonwealth Court is REVERSED. See Marchlen v. Township of Mt. Lebanon, 560 Pa. 453, 746 A.2d 566 (2000).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
James A. NEWBREY, Respondent, v. The TOWNSHIP AND SCHOOL DISTRICT OF UPPER ST. CLAIR and Douglas A. Watkins, Township Manager, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 17, 2000.
